Web3 RPC Methods

This is a sub-package of web3.js.

web3-rpc-methods contains RPC methods for various ETH related protocols.

Installation

You can install the package either using NPM or using Yarn

Using NPM 

npm install web3-rpc-methods

Using Yarn 

yarn add web3-rpc-methods

Getting Started

  • :writing_hand: If you have questions submit an issue or join us on Discord

Prerequisites

  • :gear: NodeJS (LTS/Fermium)
  • :toolbox: Yarn/Lerna

Package.json Scripts

Script Description
clean Uses rimraf to remove dist/
build Uses tsc to build package and dependent packages
lint Uses eslint to lint package
lint:fix Uses eslint to check and fix any warnings
format Uses prettier to format the code
test Uses jest to run unit tests
test:integration Uses jest to run tests under /test/integration
test:unit Uses jest to run tests under /test/unit
